named-query.name: localDoEndereco
named-query.query: select l from LocalGenerico l where l.endereco.uf = :estado and l.endereco.cidade = :cidade and l.endereco.bairro = :bairro and l.endereco.logradouro = :rua and l.endereco.num = :num

named-query.name: salasDoLocal
named-query.query: select s from Sala s where s.local.id = :id

named-query.name: salaPorNome
named-query.query: select s from Sala s where s.nome = :nome

named-query.name: sessaoPorNome
named-query.query: select s from Sessao s where s.nome = :nome

named-query.name: sessoesDoLocal
named-query.query: select s from Sessao s where s.local.id = :id

named-query.name: sessoesPorEntreterimentoELocal
named-query.query: select s from Sessao s where s.entretenimento = :entreterimento and s.local.id = :id

named-query.name: sessoesPorLocalEDia
named-query.query: select s from Sessao s where s.local.id = :idLocal and s.data = :data

named-query.name: sessoesDaSala
named-query.query: select s from Sessao s where s.sala= :sala

named-query.name: eventoPorSessao
named-query.query: select e from Evento e where e.sessao = :sessao
